lead_paragraph: Clint Hurdle spent spring training tinkering with the Pittsburgh Pirates lineup and preaching the importance of selflessness. Of moving runners over. Of being patient at the plate and aggressive on the bases.

headline.print_headline: Liriano Dominates, Pirates Open With 4-1 Win Over Cardinals
headline.main: Liriano Dominates, Pirates Open With 4-1 Win Over Cardinals
